result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon L. Lochli

records.addlTxt:
10:20 AM case called. Prosecuting Attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Brandon Lochli in custody but not brought over. Attorney Kate Cook appeared on behalf of Attorney Zebulon Patek in court for Brandon L. Lochli. 

Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 11/14/2022 at 2:30 PM
Hearing scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.

(Case called at 11:23 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Brandon Lochli appears in custody via video conference from the Jackson County Jail without counsel. ADA Monica Fallon appears in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Warrant executed. Defendant updates address. Defendant indicates he intends to fire his attorney- court advises the Defendant to contact the Public Defender's Office regarding having a new attorney appointed. 
State requests $250 cash bond- recites failures to appear. Defendant requests signature bond. Court orders $250 cash bond- all previous conditions remain in effect. 
Hearing: 10/27/2022 at 9:30 AM.

Conditions:
No contact with L.N.
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting. 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Provide identification information as to legal name and current address.

ADDRESS INFO for Brandon L. Lochli
Current: 1411 Martiny Ct, Baraboo, WI 53913 United States  (Effective: 08-22-2022)
Prior: 1411 Martinee Ct, Baraboo, WI 53913 United States

9:48 AM case called. Prosecuting Attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Brandon L. Lochli not in court.  Attorney Zebulon Patek in court for Brandon L. Lochli. Attorney Patek has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. State request warrant.

Warrant ordered but stayed until 10/10/2022.
Notice of Assignment of Judge - Per USPS, Return to Sender - Attempted - Not Known
Notice of Assignment of Judge - Return to Sender, *Re-sent to new address on file.
